message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. After considering our options, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1300000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a counter-counteroffer of $1250000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair for both parties.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1225000. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1225000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make a new counteroffer of $1275000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair for both parties.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1230000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept your final offer of $1230000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and I'm willing to meet you at $1290000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
